alert.note: Alert for Allen; Chase; Greenwood; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:31AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of sleet, freezing rain, and snow, gradually transitioning to all snow this morning. Total snow accumulations through Thursday morning of 5 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Ice accumulations up to around one-tenth of an inch across southeast Kansas. * WHERE...Portions of East-Central and Southeast Kansas. * WHEN...Through noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Gusty north winds will support blowing and drifting snow, which could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bitter Cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero tonight into Thursday morning could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
